column3: Did you feel the application's social features (posts and comments) were useful for your progress?
no not really. I live a place where I dont know many people where I live so I didn't have anyone to challenge.
Not necessarily for me. It's probably nice if you have a lot of friends using it though
Not really. The activity/hobby related ones were more to my liking.
I don’t know who else is using the app
column4: except for one person. I feel it would require a better way to find friends in order to build a network and take advantage of the social features

column3: maybe if I would have more friends added
haven’t really used much of the application
